definitions.title: pl.abstr.
definitions.body: supplication for favour;—abs. [[תַּחֲנוּנִים]] Pr 18:23 + 4 t.; cstr. [[תַּחֲנוּנֵי]] Je 3:21, 2Ch 6:21; sf. 1 S. [[תַּחֲנוּנַי]] Ps 28:2 etc., + 9 t. sf.; also [[תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָָי]] Ps 86:6; —
made to men: ´[[דִּבֶּר ת]] (a poor man to the rich) Pr 18:23; [[אֵל]] ´[[ת]] supplication unto (crocodile to man) Job 40:27; elsewhere

to God: ‖ [[תפלה]] Ps 143:1, Da 9:3, Da 9:17; [[אשׁר התפלל]] ´[[ת]] 2Ch 6:21 (= ´[[קוֹל ת]] 1Ki 8:30);  voice of supplication Ps 28:2, Ps 28:6, Ps 31:23, Ps 86:6, Ps 130:2, Ps 140:7, also Ps 116:2 (for [[קוֹלִי]] is old case-ending, and cstr. as LXX Vulgate Che Bae al.); ‖ [[בְּכִי]] Je 31:9; ´[[בְּכִּי ת]] Je 3:21; ´[[רוח חן ות]] Zec 12:10; [[לְפָנֶיךָ]] ´[[אֲנַחְנוּ מַפִּילִים ת]] Da 9:18 we are presenting our supplications before thee; ´[[בִּתְחִלִּת ת]] Da 9:23 at the beginning of thy supplication.
